subject: United Bank for Africa PLC
body:
United Bank for Africa PLC
Office: 57 Marina Lagos Island,
Lagos - Nigeria
Swift: UNAFNGLA228
Attention: Sir/Madam.
This is to inform you that ATM Card Number: (4454931745188689) worth USD$10.5 Million has been accredited to your favor as compensation fund, you are advised to contact Mr. Oliver Alawuba with the below information.
1. Your Full Name.
2. Your Telephone and Fax number.
3. Your Home Address {Where you want the ATM Card to be delivered to}.
4. Your Age and Sex.
5. Your Occupation.
6. Your Next of Kin.
As soon as the above mentioned details are received, your ATM Card will be shipped to your home address via courier delivery company with international travel immunity in accordance with World Bank and IMF recommendations.
Regards
Mr. James Adewole
Customer Unit
UBA Group Nigeria

subject: Re:   United Bank for Africa PLC
body:
Hello Mr. James Adewole,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm intrigued by this opportunity, but I have a few questions before we proceed further.

Could you please explain more about the purpose of this ATM card? Also, could you provide some information about the courier delivery company that will be handling the shipment?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Jan
